description:
Love painting? Always wanted to try watercolor? Already work with watercolor and want to pick up some interesting techniques and see a new approach?
Then this course is perfect for you!

More than 1000 happy students took this course and recieved just positive reviews and most important got lots of fun!
This is what my students are saying about the course:

[by Marina Savchuk]·

Amazing Instructions!

I loved this course so much! I have never been able to paint before, and now I have an amazing artwork done by me! Love it, thank you Yana! Looking forward to your new course


[by Carol Kiley] ·

Loved this class!

She is an amazing artist and instructor! Attention to details with explanations interesting and consistent. I got so many nuggets to help me with my painting that I feel like this course was worth a lot more than what I paid...thank you very much for the inspiration!

[by Peter Cook] ·

Highly recommended!

This is a wonderful and comprehensive drawing course. Yana is an amazing artist, and I feel very grateful that she shares her skills with me as a student. She is engaging, soft spoken, and keeping the listener interested until the last second. Doing this course really made me feel like I too can draw anything I want. I recommend this course for anyone who wants to learn how to make beautiful drawings!

***


I'll create a realistic dog portrait explaining every single step and sharing my vision with you on paint mixing and color building. I'll explain every single step I've taken and why. You'll learn how to create incredibly realistic eyes, how to paint fur, how to create volume and how to make our artwork alive. You will paint along with me during the entire course. And of course you're absolutely free to experiment, try your own thing following your heart and see what happens.

Everybody can paint and you don't need a school to start doing it! I will not bother you with boring school theory, we will start from the scratch and paint an awesome dog together. All you need is a desire, true interest and some patience. Because everything you create is your personal experience and it can't be "wrong". You don’t need someone to give you an assignment. As long as you follow your own vision and enjoy the process, that's all that matters.

I'll provide the reference photo I'm using. Feel free to use your own style of materials and ask me any questions you might have in discussion.

When you buy the course, you'll receive lifetime access. Most importantly, you'll have a 30 day money back guarantee (no questions asked).
So what are you waiting for?

Follow your passion, take a brush and go ahead ;)
title: Watercolor painting: Realistic Dog portrait, step by step
